SELECT /* com.at.apcss.fm.fclt.mapper.FcltPrcsPrfmncMapper.selectFcltPrcsPrfmncRawDataList */ OP.CRTR_YR AS CRTR_YR , OP.APC_CD AS APC_CD , (SELECT X.APC_NM FROM TB_APC_INFO X WHERE X.APC_CD = OP.APC_CD) AS APC_NM , (SELECT FN_GET_COM_CD_VL_NM('UNTY_CTPV', OP.CTPV_CD) FROM DUAL) AS CTPV_NM , (SELECT USRAM.FN_GET_COM_CD_VL_EXPLN('UNTY_SGG', OP.SIGUN_CD) FROM DUAL) AS SIGUN_NM , OTI.SN , OTI.ITEM_CD , OTI.ITEM_NM , AOPD.APC_TRMT_AMT , AOPD.APC_TRMT_VLM , AOPD.TM_SPMT_AMT , AOPD.TM_SPMT_RT , AOPD.APC_GNRL_TRMT_AMT , AOPD.APC_OGNZ_CPRTN_SORT_TRST , AOPD.APC_CTRT_EMSPAP FROM TB_TE_APC_OPER_PRSN_OTLN OP
JOIN TB_TE_APC_OPER_TRMT_ITEM OTI ON OTI.CRTR_YR = OP.CRTR_YR AND OTI.APC_CD = OP.APC_CD AND OTI.OGNZ_SE_CD = '2' AND OTI.APC_CD IS NOT NULL AND OTI.DEL_YN = 'N'
LEFT JOIN TB_TE_APC_OPER_PRFMNC_DTL AOPD ON AOPD.CRTR_YR = OTI.CRTR_YR AND AOPD.APC_CD = OTI.APC_CD AND AOPD.SN = OTI.SN AND AOPD.DEL_YN = 'N'
WHERE OP.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND OP.CRTR_YR = #{crtrYr}
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_APC_INFO X WHERE X.APC_CD = OP.APC_CD
AND X.CTPV = (SELECT CU.CTPV FROM TB_COM_USER CU WHERE CU.USER_ID = #{userId})
AND X.SGG = (SELECT CU.SGG FROM TB_COM_USER CU WHERE CU.USER_ID = #{userId})
)
UNION ALL SELECT OP.CRTR_YR AS CRTR_YR , OP.APC_CD AS APC_CD , (SELECT X.APC_NM FROM TB_APC_INFO X WHERE X.APC_CD = OP.APC_CD) AS APC_NM , (SELECT FN_GET_COM_CD_VL_NM('UNTY_CTPV', OP.CTPV_CD) FROM DUAL) AS CTPV_NM , (SELECT USRAM.FN_GET_COM_CD_VL_EXPLN('UNTY_SGG', OP.SIGUN_CD) FROM DUAL) AS SIGUN_NM , AOPD.SN , AOPD.ITEM_CD , (SELECT FN_GET_COM_CD_VL_NM('CMSU_ADM_ITEM_CD', AOPD.ITEM_CD) FROM DUAL) AS ITEM_NM , AOPD.APC_TRMT_AMT , AOPD.APC_TRMT_VLM , AOPD.TM_SPMT_AMT , AOPD.TM_SPMT_RT , AOPD.APC_GNRL_TRMT_AMT , AOPD.APC_OGNZ_CPRTN_SORT_TRST , AOPD.APC_CTRT_EMSPAP FROM TB_TE_APC_OPER_PRSN_OTLN OP
JOIN TB_TE_APC_OPER_PRFMNC_DTL AOPD ON AOPD.CRTR_YR = OP.CRTR_YR AND AOPD.APC_CD = OP.APC_CD AND AOPD.ITEM_CD = 'XC01' AND AOPD.DEL_YN = 'N'
WHERE OP.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND OP.CRTR_YR = #{crtrYr}
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_APC_INFO X WHERE X.APC_CD = OP.APC_CD
AND X.CTPV = (SELECT CU.CTPV FROM TB_COM_USER CU WHERE CU.USER_ID = #{userId})
AND X.SGG = (SELECT CU.SGG FROM TB_COM_USER CU WHERE CU.USER_ID = #{userId})
)
ORDER BY CRTR_YR, APC_NM, OTI.SN
